parameters.parameter: If true, then the field will render out with a disabled attribute (to turn off client-side behavior). Further, a disabled field ignores any value in the request when the form is\ submitted.
Allows a specific implementation of org.apache.tapestry.ValueEncoder to be supplied. This is used to create client-side string values for the different radio button values.
The property read and updated by the group as a whole.

element.examples: Examples are provided with the documentation of the Radio component.
